description: AnyWave is a software designed to easily open and view data recorded by EEG or MEG acquisition systems.
name: anywave
label: AnyWave

description: Bidsalyzer is a BIDS-compliant application whose goal is to take raw brain recordings and process them to obtain the frequency responses using a combination of band pass filter and Hilbert Envelope.
name: bidsalyzer
label: Bidsalyzer

description: Package to collect, organise and manage neuroscience data in Brain Imaging Data Structure (BIDS) format.
name: bidsmanager
label: BIDS-Manager

description: Brainstorm is a collaborative, open-source application dedicated to the analysis of brain recordings: MEG, EEG, fNIRS, ECoG, depth electrodes and multiunit electrophysiology.
name: brainstorm

name: brainstorm_matlab

description: BrainVISA provides a complete, modular, infrastructure for neuroimaging software. It helps organizing heterogeneous software and data and provides a common general graphical interface for users.
name: brainvisa
label: BrainVisa

name: dcm2niix

description: GARDEL is a tool for automatic segmentation and labelization of SEEG contacts.
name: gardel

description: HiBoP illustrates the possibility to render group-level activity dynamically at the cortical level, for several experimental conditions (columns) of the same cognitive paradigm.

name: intranat

name: libreoffice
